website_summaries.verdict: It's heavier than a YETI Hopper cooler, but it also keeps things colder for a much longer period.
pros: Keeps up to 14 cans cold and provides the maximum cold retention technology you'll find in small coolers
cons: Keeps things colder longer than coolers in the Hopper line, but it is quite a bit heavier

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: The cooler leaks profusely from the drain hole. I tightened the plug as tightly as I could, still leaked. Flipped the rubber gasket on the plug around, still leaks. Bought a new plug on amazon, still leaks. Just filled out a warranty claim and am waiting to hear from yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W.

customer_reviews.title: Crap for the expense
customer_reviews.text: Paid $200.00 for a cooler that only holds ice for 1 1/2 Days. Crap for the expense
customer_reviews.author: Lonna Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Big mistake! Too heavy and I see ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Big mistake! Too heavy and I see little, if any, difference in how long it keeps ice!
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Stanley

customer_reviews.title: DRAIN PLUG WILL LEAK WATER
customer_reviews.text: I read the reports about water leaking from the drain plug and thought that YETI would have rectified the defect by now. Before it was used I closed the drain plug with a very good hand "snug." I filled it to ~1 inch above the drain with water. It started leaking. About 1 drop every 30 seconds. I then gave it my "Popeye the Sailor" hand tightening, and that stopped the leaking (for now). Now I have to see about ordering a replacement part....time I'd rather be doing something else. Until YETI fixes this problem, and then puts out some advertising specifically stating they fixed the leak problem, I'd NOT BUY this product.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Ice didn't last any longer than my Igloo ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Ice didn't last any longer than my Igloo cooler. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Drain leaking water
customer_reviews.text: I have the YETI Roadie 20 Cooler in IceBlue color. First thing I did was put some frozen stuff and ice packs into it. Next day the water that had melted leaked from the drainage. So I thought to myself, must have not tighten the cap for the drain. So I tightened it as best I could and did the test again. The drainage on this cooler is bad?
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the $$$'s
customer_reviews.text: Had to tighten drain plug out of the box to keep from leaking and the lid seal is suspect. Just marginally better at keeping ice than my ancient Playmate cooler that weighs less than half of this Yeti. Received as a Father's Day gift from my daughters or I would send it back as it is definitely not worth the price. The larger iconic Yeti's may be fantastic, but based on my experience with this cooler...I won't be finding out!
customer_reviews.author: trishal

customer_reviews.title: Save alot of money by taking your own drinks in the car
customer_reviews.text: We've tested it twice now. We take it on road trips. The first trip, it held our soda pop extremely cold for 3 days. Even then , it was still cold, but water was there, so we dumped that, and finally put new ice in. We had sandwiches, and vegetable sticks in it, and it all stayed perfect. I would say colder than a refrigerator, which is how I like drinks. Great for the road. Great to keep in your room at the hotel. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: melinda hester

customer_reviews.title: Just not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Family members have raved about various Yeti products, and I seen them in action and was impressed -- but this cooler just isn't worth it. After being filled with ice at late night, by morning there was 2 inches of water and not much ice left. It was inside in an air conditioned room. No excuses for that. I expected much better from Yeti -- at this price it isn't any sort of value.
customer_reviews.author: Kate K.

customer_reviews.title: Holds ice very well but...
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is the two lid patches are made of a rubber that grips onto pants, plastic and fabric You need to carry it a certain way so it doesn't catch on clothing as you walk and is tough to put into tight spaces for same reason. Lots of others out there with different style latches
customer_reviews.author: Local Hobby Farm

customer_reviews.title: Staying Power
customer_reviews.text: Amazing staying power, days long, as well as a perfectly thought out design. Fits in the back of my two door Jeep with the rear seats up and ready for the beach. It is heavy, but totally necesssary due to its toughness and capability. Do yourself a favor and pull the trigger on this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Molenda

customer_reviews.title: The Ice melted hella fast almost instantly and completely melted ...
customer_reviews.text: The Ice melted hella fast almost instantly and completely melted in about 2 or 3 days its definitely over priced and without any in it probably 10 to 15 lbs save ur money dont get one get something else
customer_reviews.author: Cory wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Kinda doubted this was gonna be as good as everyone says but it really is. It’s heavy so don’t expect to walk far without getting tired. But it keeps everything Ice cold. Make sure you Pre cool it. Can’t expect to think it’ll work as good if it’s hot already. It’s a solid cooler. You can tell it isn’t made cheap. Yeti found a new customer
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Packing your cooler
customer_reviews.text: I put 2 gal jugs frozen in my box for 2 days then took out those replaced with about 6 bottles water plus 2 bottles of monster energy booster milk about 4 trays of of ice keep for 7 days water was actually frozen when got them out heat index has been over 100 for about 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: David Norris

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with this cooler! Very durable and keeps my food and drinks cool for days in the 90-100 degree car. It is a bit expensive, but to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Lim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction that keeps your items cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable cooler that can withstand the day to day wear and tear from constant use. You are going to pay a little more for the product but that pays off in quality, workmanship, and sturdiness. Amazed that it can keep our drinks iced cold for hours in some of the hottest summer temps.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: first YETI i've owned
customer_reviews.text: this is the first Yeti I've ever owned, but my goodness is it ever heavy. that is the only reason I don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: TRHenry

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the cooler wasn’t sure it was going to be large enough to do what I wanted. Great fit for our trucks. Keeps ice very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Size perfect for men & women
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my family. They love the size and easy handle to carry they also liked he color.. They were excited to receive a YETI!
customer_reviews.author: kickstraight

customer_reviews.title: Perfect companion
customer_reviews.text: Yeti's reputation is the best out there.... best thing it was discounted during prime day!
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This cooler leaked from the beginning. I put it in my car and there was water everywhere. The drain plug has a slow leak. I ordered a replacement valve but it is still leaking. I contacted YETI and I am going through the returns process and I will see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya A Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a trip recently; ice barely melted over a 2 day drive. Kept things frozen so we could bring back our favorite clam chowder base from the Oregon coast. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Buy USA!

customer_reviews.title: Food storage phenomenon.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a beach trip and were able to store extra food for the week we were there.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: Yeti baby! I love this cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Wow at last I got this. Gorgeous, practical and the perfect chill!
customer_reviews.author: Toren Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: If you more than 2 people at the beach or pool, I'd recommend a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 2 person Yeti!
customer_reviews.text: As with all Yeti products...great performance such high quality! Expensive but your buying a lifetime cooler.
customer_reviews.author: JS from Boston

customer_reviews.title: Well made but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and available colors are very pretty, but it is extremely heavy and the black pull latches in the front are hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Shopper

customer_reviews.title: doesn't live up to its advertisement
customer_reviews.text: bought for gift for my husband to use in the boat but he states doesn't keep contents cold
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Robeerts

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through countless coolers over the years. None compare to the Yeti. I have the wine glasses and the tumblers which are all engineered to fit boat cup holders perfectly. Great gift ideas.
customer_reviews.author: David Weiss

customer_reviews.title: best out there
customer_reviews.text: Yeti is pricey but are high quality. My father in law loves it.
customer_reviews.author: wlw3

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!! Use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler, especially for $60 off full retail on Amazon Prime day. This roadie matches my larger arctic blue Tundra 65. Yeti coolers are built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Lynam

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks and water cold forever.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler to use on the farm during hay baling season. Don’t know what I would do without it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C.

customer_reviews.title: a little birthday gift to myself
customer_reviews.text: also i wanted a cooler that was sturdy enough that I could sit, stand on, climb up on, etc
customer_reviews.author: SP in NC

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Good cooler but is very heavy. Was surprises at how heavy it was without anything in it, not good for moving around despite the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kasera

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not keep ice very well, overpriced for the use. it only kept ice for a day
customer_reviews.author: patt thomashefsky

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it Cold!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great size for taking beverages on golf outings. I don’t understand the rubber gaskets to close it the Roadie. They are a bit awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and stays cold when done right!
customer_reviews.text: Kool cooler. Remember to pre-cool before you koad it for maximum cooling time.
customer_reviews.author: MotorCity Madman

customer_reviews.title: High quality cooler
customer_reviews.text: Sure, YETI items are pricey, but they're made so well that if you cut that cost down over time then it's definitely worth the money. Don't hesitate to buy if you find it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Malu

customer_reviews.title: Love this Roadie Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this Roadie Cooler. My husband loved getting this as a gift. He uses it all the time. It keeps everything ice cold :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Lives up to the hype. Ice lasts longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: JONESE

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, did come in yeti box so if gifting it is obvious what it is
customer_reviews.author: Shaun D.

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Prettiest color I’ve ever seen. No damage whatsoever upon arrival. Shipped super fast. Haven’t tests for leaks yet. First yeti cooler purchase so I’m very excited to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a little heavier to carry then most coolers but keeps your stuff cool all day! Well worth the money. My husband uses his cooler everyday for work and loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold ice and leaks
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t hold ice even for an hour. Leaks out if drain. I’m wondering if it is a fake Yeti??
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: It did keep ice and drinks like we
customer_reviews.text: Only thing wrong is its heavy. It did keep ice and drinks like we wanted
customer_reviews.author: Linda russell

customer_reviews.title: Impressive cooler
customer_reviews.text: We use this cooler for holding drinks ice instead of in and out of frig all day. Kept 16 lb of ice for nearly a week.

customer_reviews.title: Cooler Leaks from Bottom
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until this week. It is leaking from the bottom. A cooler this expensize and the reputation it has should not leak.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected! Love it! This will be a great gift. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep ice as long as I assumed.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t keep ice as long as I assumed.. *Very heavy Basically is a regular cooler performance for a rediclous price. Cute color though
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes it and can't wait to put it to use
customer_reviews.author: jaki

customer_reviews.title: Home Run!
customer_reviews.text: My husband opened this as a surprise for Christmas. His response, "Every man secretly desires a Yeti" Thanks for the home run Yeti!
customer_reviews.author: KathiWathi

customer_reviews.title: for 2 days easily. I tried another produce and all of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I meal prep and take my food with me. This Yeti will hold ice in at hot trunk of a car, with the outside temperature being 110, for 2 days easily. I tried another produce and all of the ice had melted and ruined all of my food by the end of a 12 hour shift. When they say as good as as Yeti, there is NO comparison. Spend the money and get the one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: To small and heavy. I’m going to try it when we go to beach
customer_reviews.author: Christine Holguin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have a large Yeti with the badger wheels, but it has become so difficult for me to lift (I’m 65) I decided to get the Roadie 20 and give the big Yeti to my daughter. I love this Roadie, it’s plenty good size for me for weekend camping and outings. I love the handle and I have no problems lifting it into the truck when full. I love the Roadie, got the blue one!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler
customer_reviews.text: Very durable Keeps things cold for days! Best cooler ever
customer_reviews.author: Lori Tessier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Easily handled and keeps everything for a whole camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.text: I loved this until I used it. The ice was gone in 6 hours. This is crazy! My pink $24.00 ice chest kept ice for 2 days this Yeti did not keep it hours. I am soo disappointed. I had this in storage and finally went on a road trip to use it and it did not cool anything. I deserve a FULL Refund!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooler.
customer_reviews.text: ITSA YETI, you can bet it is 5 stars! It is a little heavy but it is tough as nails and will keep your ice for days....we use it for extra ice and it sits great on the counter.....Just waiting for yeti to come out with an ice bucket! Until then, this will work famously :)
customer_reviews.author: LT Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great offical yeti product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality 100% a YETI product. I heard about fake yeti drinkware products which you should be careful of. However the yeti coolers are imposible to make fake and I have never heard of it being done couldnt find anything on the internet about it. This came with the latest yeti magazine a few stickers, in an offical yeti box. Not to mention when I registered my yeti on their website I got a free bottle opener. However be careful it is very heavy even when empty im talking probably way over 10lbs.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he loves it! It's the perfect size for one person and for a 12 pack
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cass

customer_reviews.title: She loves it and says it is the best cooler for keeping items cool for a really long ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift request for our daughter. She loves it and says it is the best cooler for keeping items cool for a really long time without having to refill the cooler with ice. According to her, it is the Best Cooler to Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Walden

customer_reviews.title: I'm a YETI fan!! But it is heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I have Yeti tumblers and can koozie so getting a great cooler was a no brainer. This thing is tough and really keeps things ice cold for hours, great for Florida. Only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because it is heavy! But I have now purchased a "Dolly Trolly" and it makes the trip to the beach, car, boat much easier! Wheels could be an upgrade to the Yeti, but now I can roll with the hand cart I purchased easily.
customer_reviews.author: CLP

customer_reviews.title: It leaks from the drain plug
customer_reviews.text: I don't like getting my car and my home wet. I returned it, and have yet to get my $200+ refund. Very unhappy with YETI and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Christmas gift for a guy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for Christmas gifts. My son and son in law seemed happy, and I knew that they would learn to love them even more over time.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who travels a lot. It is amazingly well made and keeps items cool for up to 10 days. It holds a good bit also. Steps above any other cooler on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine S.

customer_reviews.title: I needed to keep things frozen on a two day ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to keep things frozen on a two day road trip and this did the job. I wish it wasn't so expensive, but it works well so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! holds ice for days
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it! I love it! holds ice for days, and the latches and hinges seem invincible!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted for Christmas. Keeps stuff cold for days! Also, it functions perfectly as an adult sticker book which is a bit of a trend down South.
customer_reviews.author: Shoptherapy123

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Pros Good Quality, keeps drinks cold Cons. Heavy when ice and drinks are added. Hard to keep clean. People constantly standing on it. Nice bonus can opener free when u register. I will buy other sizes in the future
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, bad malfunction
customer_reviews.text: While it did keep our goods cold for a long time, our cooler was faulty. The drain plug malfunctioned and ended up leaking all over our bed during our 2 week road trip (we were car camping and had to put all our bags and the cooler on top of the bed). While this was incredibly frustrating, that doesn't mean that all coolers will have this problem and we have since been sent new drain plugs from Yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: The right cooler, and the right color.
customer_reviews.text: The right cooler, and the right color. I had ordered this cooler from another vendor, and was disappointed when my backorder was cancelled. It seems that this color is the most popular, leading the other guys to running out of it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Puck

customer_reviews.title: YETI Roadie
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler and better store I purchased it from because I received the cooler days before it was expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great Yeti!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. Works great. Yeti comes through again.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love my Yeti products. Got this as a gift for the in-laws.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Buy it. You won't regret. I'm so glad I made the purchase. It's PERFECT for road trips, as one might surmise from the name :)

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: It really does keep ice longer and it has really held up better than any other cooler on the four wheeler

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my Son.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to gift him with something he would not buy for himself because of the price. He deserves it.

customer_reviews.title: Cooler is great, but was leaking from  the drain plug when arrived
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged. Leaking when arrived, no obvious damage to packaging. Yeti replaced, but where did the damage occur? Factory/shipping/vendor?

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small family outing
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler- its great for when my son, daughter and I go to the lake or the beach. Plenty of room for drinks, sandwich and ice!!

customer_reviews.title: I assumed the cooler would be pretty blue, definitely not
customer_reviews.text: I assumed the cooler would be pretty blue, definitely not.Also, the cooler feels like you're carrying around 10 bricks with you.However it keeps my food and drinks from getting hot and does the job. I would recommend but not in this ugly assed color.

customer_reviews.title: It did hold temp good.
customer_reviews.text: The lid did not stay open by it self. I had to hold it open while loading it up. It did hold temp good.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this cooler at a great price, and it delivered in a timely manner
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler at a great price, and it delivered in a timely manner. The cooler performs better than other coolers I have purchased in the past but I don't know if it's worth the expense in the end. It's nice if you have the means.
customer_reviews.author: rick price

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality to the point of worthless
customer_reviews.text: Wery disappointed! This chest doesn't hold ice any better than a styrofoam chest from the dime store. Don't waste your money. Three large blue gel ice packs last less than eight hours in my air conditioned Explorer. The only reason I gave it two stars is the certainty that it is stronger than styrofoam. Save your money and buy something else.

customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that I spent $200 and then Yeti decides to not back our Second amendment!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, well built
customer_reviews.text: What you expect of yeti. Good quality, well built, stays cold.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Only it is heavy for a girl to ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, Only it is heavy for a girl to haul around. But it did keep the tenderloin I bought at Costco,Austin, TX. We drove from Waco, TX to Laredo, TX and in between we stopped at Costco. Great birthday present!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anasales719

product_meta.title: YETI Roadie 20 Cooler, LE Coral
feature_bullets: The YETI Roadie is BYOB’s new best friend with a capacity of up to 14 cans with recommended 2:1 ice-to-contents ratio
Ice stays ice thanks to up to 2 inches of PermaFrost Insulation and an extra thick FatWall design which is certified bear-resistant

The Rotomolded Construction makes the Roadie armored to the core and virtually indestructible so wherever you decide to take it, this portable cooler’s sturdy construction will stand up to the rigors of the journey
The Roadie, like the Tundra, features T-Rex Lid Latches constructed of heavy-duty rubber so you’ll never see another busted latch and has patented keeper technology
The Roadie dimensions are 19 in long x 13 3/4 in wide x 14 3/8 in high with an empty weight of 15 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars44 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
